title: Ghost Game
body:
Stuck trying to reconnect to a game. Game was won 15 minutes ago. 

2 players DC'd in that game. Please help. Cannot rejoin queue.

replies.body: I've been stuck in a ghost game for about 2.5 hours after skipping stats.
feels like 3 hours for me... rip need to get another account just for this i guess
Hey, I'm seeing quite a few posts about it now.  I'm looking into this to see if something might be going on.  There were some Ghost game issues yesterday, but it may be rearing its head in again.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lNW1rosW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-21T17:57:50.768+0000)
>
> Hey, I'm seeing quite a few posts about it now.  I'm looking into this to see if something might be going on.  There were some Ghost game issues yesterday, but it may be rearing its head in again.

Me and my friend that were duoing are now stuck in the  "ghost game"

Yeah, it sounds like there was another spike of this but I'm trying to get more info on it now.  In the meantime, you may have to wait for the server to pick up the match ended in order to put you back in the client.

idk if this will help you at all but im stuck in the same issue, after the game originally ended, the sever couldn't load the post game stats and i ended up skipping them, it may be a factor into whats causing the game to be (ghost) if the server cant see the stats for the game

Selecting to skip stats shouldn't cause this.  A ghost game can be caused by an issue on our side, where the server fails to receive a message from the match that it ended.  Will keep you guys updated as I get more info, hang tight!
i also selected skip waiting for stats...
mine is fixed finally, after almost 4 hours
i am also stuck in a ghost game... restarted client and computer... nothing... even tried repairing... rip
Im also stuck, is there anything we can do ?
Yup i've been stuck in a ghost game for almost an hour now hehe ^^. Figured you guys would let us know on status page or on here when a fix is made.
